input.sentences: it was a very quiet day in the town
all of the old buildings were abandon
not a soul around for miles and miles
output.sentences: As I was walking looking at the direction to where my friend want us to meet I am kind of lost but I am sure I can see someone to help me find the place.
She did kind of mentioned for me to go straight pass Mendenhall student center and I will find the coffee shop she is located in.
Wow it is kind of hard to find anybody in this sort of area!. Is like no human to be found around here. Not even a single animal that can direct me to where I am suppose to be
I kind of find myself weird looking at this. Looks like nobody lives here or something. I am not really sure but I have to keep moving.
Oh, look I finally found the coffee shop!. It is straight ahead but on the right side of the street :).
